title: Bitstream
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Bitstream**

(NASDAQ: BITS)

Font retailer and rendering technology provider.

_Officers:(as of July 2005)_  
 [Anna M. Chagnon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Anna%20M.%20Chagnon): President and Chief Executive Officer  
 [John Collins](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/John%20Collins): Vice President and Chief Technology Officer  
 [James P. Dore](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/James%20P.%20Dore): Vice President and Chief Financial Officer  
 [Sampo Kaasila](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sampo%20Kaasila): Vice President of Research and Development  
 [Costas Kitsos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Costas%20Kitsos): Vice President of Engineering

_Board of Directors (July 2005)_  
 [Charles Ying](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Charles%20Ying): Chairman  
 [George B. Beitzel](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/George%20B.%20Beitzel%20)  
 [Anna M. Chagnon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Anna%20M.%20Chagnon)  
 [Amos Kaminski](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Amos%20Kaminski)  
 [David G. Lubrano](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20G.%20Lubrano)

**Discussion:**  
 [David Berlow gives the history of the Bitstream/Linotype misunderstanding](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202115/http:/typophile.com/node/28117?from=50&comments_per_page=50#comment-157813)
author: Jared Benson
